subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Boo Weekley made birdies on Nos. 8, 9 and 10 to take the lead at Colonial in Fort Worth, and he finished with a four-under 66 for his first PGA Tour victory in five years.
snippet: Boo Weekley made birdies on Nos. 8, 9 and 10 to take the lead at Colonial in Fort Worth, and he finished with a four-under 66 for his first PGA Tour victory in five years.
